summary: TL_SpellPerkFortifyWithSkill : Novice,Apprentice,Adept,Expert,Master spell perk fortify spell with skill.
descriptionHtml:
TL_SpellPerkFortifyWithSkill

author: Tango Luni

version 2


TL_SpellPerkFortifyWithSkill :

Novice,Apprentice,Adept,Expert,Master spell perk fortify spell with skill.

For example, Novice Destruction perk fortify magnitude of Novice Destruction spells.

Alteration,Destruction,Illusion,Restoration fortify magnitude,
Conjuration fortify duration.

+1% magnitude/duration per 1 skill

TL_SpellPerkFortifyWithSkill_Mag_Dur.esp
All school perk fortify magnitude and duration. Use either one.


This plugin changes these Perk :

PERK
  000C44B8 AlterationAdept50
  000C44B7 AlterationApprentice25
  000C44B9 AlterationExpert75
  000C44BA AlterationMaster100
  000F2CA6 AlterationNovice00
  000C44BC ConjurationAdept50
  000C44BB ConjurationApprentice25
  000C44BD ConjurationExpert75
  000C44BE ConjurationMaster100
  000F2CA7 ConjurationNovice00
  000C44C0 DestructionAdept50
  000C44BF DestructionApprentice25
  000C44C1 DestructionExpert75
  000C44C2 DestructionMaster100
  000F2CA8 DestructionNovice00
  000C44C4 IllusionAdept50
  000C44C3 IllusionApprentice25
  000C44C5 IllusionExpert75
  000C44C6 IllusionMaster100
  000F2CA9 IllusionNovice00
  000C44C8 RestorationAdept50
  000C44C7 RestorationApprentice25
  000C44C9 RestorationExpert75
  000C44CA RestorationMaster100
  000F2CAA RestorationNovice00


Based on Skilled_Magic
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6599
